title: hing ping
body:
Latley I've been playing with 330-1000 ping and I don't know why. 
When I check my connection it's great and my ping at http://www.pingtest.net/   15.
Please help me so I can play normally.

replies.body:
Huge changes in latency tend to be caused by routing changes by your ISP that causes your connection to take a longer path to our servers. Before we run a traceroute to look into your routing, I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are properly configured for League.

Please let me know if you continue to experience issues with this.
